# HomogenR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of HomogenR is to provide functions to check homogeneity of long term climatological series.

## Installation

Install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/shadrackkibet/HomogenR) with:

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("shadrackkibet/HomogenR")
```
